title: ICEYE delivers flood insights from recent hurricanes to FEMA in collaboration with New Light Technologies and Bana Solutions
key_assets: ICEYE’s flood extent and depth data
summary: ICEYE has delivered critical flood insights to FEMA for multiple major flood events, including hurricanes in Puerto Rico and Alaska, through a collaboration with New Light Technologies (NLT) and Bana Solutions. ICEYE’s SAR satellite data provides near real-time flood monitoring, enhancing FEMA’s emergency response efforts.
why_it_matters: This partnership demonstrates ICEYE’s capability to provide actionable, real-time flood data to government agencies during natural disasters, improving emergency response and decision-making. The collaboration highlights the growing role of SAR satellite data in disaster management and recovery.
